phrases: Being late for watch duty makes trouble for everyone.
At times like these, we go with you-know-what!
Pork-on-rice and pork soup sets available!!
That is it for the watch report.
Is there any other business to address?
Um, I was thinking the premade Calpis is too thin...
It is too strong, is not it?
Well, the person on duty yesterday made it, not me,
but I will do what I can.
They did say it would be windy...
What are we supposed to do after this?
The summer team leaves in 3 days!
I told you I hate hijiki!
I am told you have been a little anemic lately, Honami-san.
Those high school girls were so cute at the start.
They were not doing anything then.
After so much time in Antarctica, you will never reintegrate into society.
Sorry... with uraura, that is a sanbai man.
I told you not to rely on the suji!
I think that is a different thing, actually...
Does not the sound of a vacuum cleaner just make you think of home?
They invited me out, so I did some interviews.
They took Shirase-chan and I out for that yesterday.
Why did not you tell me?!
Because you were on watch duty today!
Who cares about some island stroll?
I am going out on the ice operation later!
It is almost time for the meetup!
We are all going on the ice operation.
The four of us will be heading out to join the ice operation.
You are shaving from these big blocks of ice?
It is forbidden to remove things from Antarctica,
so it is the only souvenir we are allowed to take freely.
This ice is full of air that is tens of thousands of years old,
so as it melts, it pops.
So this is how thousand-year-old air tastes!
When I grow up, I have got to drink alcohol with this.
I bet you would be a loud drunk, Kimari.
When this starts up, it really hits home that summer's almost over.
Soon, it will be autumn, then winter...
What do you do during winter?
Of course, research and investigation is important,
but when we hit June, it is nighttime all day.
During the day, there is a faint brightness around the horizon,
but that is the only change you see.
Otherwise, it just stays night for a long, long time.
But that just makes the stars all the more more beautiful!
You can see the aurora, too!
That is right, we never saw it!
Because we only get a tiny bit of night.
We got a photo with penguins, ate shaved ice...
we have not gotten the aurora or the Antarctic stars!
Because the sun does not go down, like I told you.
I need to get back to work.
This will be your last day on the frozen sea, right?
I told you to help me!
Sorry, I cannot get within five meters of them...
We have really gotten used to it all, have not we?
Well, no one else needs the rooms.
And we can keep sending video from here, right?
So there is no reason we have to leave right now, is there?
You are going to hurt me!
I am not, I am not.
If we do not go back now, we are stuck here all year.
I bet that once it gets dark I could sleep forever.
By the time we get back, everyone will have graduated.
Well, I do understand not wanting to go back...
You would better not let me down!
But... what are we going to do?
If there was anything we wanted to do before we leave, we should tell her.
Are you sure that is all you want?
Before we leave, we want to play with everyone here!
If I hit it out of the park, will you consider my offer?
I am holding you to that!
He still has not given up?
Gin-chan is known as the Antarctic 19-in-Pinstripes.
If you were going to cut it, you should have done it when we arrived.
I just got the urge to cut it.
You cannot keep putting it off.
She is really going, you know...
Challenge for Antarctica High School Girl Reporters
Remember us when you are home
The guests of honor are here.
Does it look good on me?
You really are your mother's daughter.
You look just like her when you smile.
Normally, we would be changing places with the winter team,
but there is no one swapping in this time,
so it is just a farewell party for the departing summer team.
You have done an excellent job, everyone.
This morning, the weather is nice.
It is an excellent morning for a departure.
In particular, I would like to talk about
Japan's first high school-aged Antarctic research team members.
I am sure they were all nervous.
We were all very, very nervous, too.
But they did an excellent job as expedition members.
The male team members' internal wishing
for them to stay has been so loud, it is audible.
It is time to give up on them.
Even after you go home, I hope you will occasionally think of us,
here in the darkness, far over the horizon, silently lasting through the winter.
Let us meet again here some day.
Now, as a representative of the summer team,
my mother was a member of your Antarctic expedition.
She loved Antarctica, and left our house in her obsession.
to be honest, it was hard for me to have positive feelings about Antarctica.
I think wanting to change that feeling was the reason I came here.
A place further than the universe.
Mom... rather, my mother called it that.
It is a place that strips everything bare.
It is a place with nothing to protect you and nowhere to hide.
It is an environment that exposes everything we are embarrassed about,
and everything we want to hide,
and so naked and crying, we are forced to come face-to-face with who we really are.
We have overcome trial after trial together.
And from that, I think I now understand...
the reason my mother loved this place was not just this scenery, this sky, this wind,
but also the time she spent here, overcoming things with her team.
where you have no choice but to overcome things with your team,
with nothing else to get in the way.
I will be back again, I swear.
Could you take this back to Yu-kun?
The Follow Backs Will not Stop
So that is your signature, Yuzuki-chan?
How many of these did you sell?
Would you please cease your babbling?
I am looking forward to your drama.
Though I will not get to see it until I get back...
There really are people looking forward to it...
Actually, I should be thanking you...
Do you remember what we talked about in the van that first day?
Talking with you then really gave me a lot of courage.
When I saw your faces, I realized I could not let our plans be canceled.
For adults, there is a moment when you should not be honest.
I think my mother would be mad if you did not let her stay for the winter.
I do not need it anymore.
The average age here just jumped.
Well, we have got a lot of time ahead of us!
Inbox Kobuchizawa Shirase Dear Mom Kobuchizawa Shirase Dear Mom Kobuchizawa Shirase Dear Mom
Kobuchizawa Takako Inbox (1483) Saved Drafts Sent Mail Trash Outbox (1)
When we first came here, it seemed so far away...
Well, that is what a journey is.
There is still the 60 degrees, the 50 degrees, the 40 degrees...
I will probably throw up again.
Barfing and barfing, thinking I am so sick, I am going to die...
That is part of the journey, too.
Do you think we have gotten a little stronger?
Or maybe we have gotten sloppier...
It is because everything is bigger here.
Is this what we are wearing?
We need to make it special!
This will be my final catchy, witty, sensational report...
Maybe you should put down the script?
I need a little more time!
I cannot get it to show up!
If that happens once in a while.
The real thing is ten thousand times more be
The real thing is ten thousand times more beautiful
I do not think it is that bright...
Does that mean we will not be together anymore?
It means that even when we are not together, we can be together.
After all... we are still who we are.
Who is that a quote from?
We still have a lot we have to do, right?
When we are done doing that, let us go on another journey.
Well, Shirase still has her million yen.
I have got my savings, too...
In the place further than the universe.
When you go on a journey, there are things you learn for the first time.
That people change, the world changes, even when you are not looking.
That there is no such thing as a nothing day.
That your house has its own smell.
If you want to learn those things, you have got to get moving.
Then just keep moving until you see something you have never seen before.
No matter how far you go, the world is so big...
You will definitely find something new.
It is a little scary, but I know you can do it.
Right now, I am in the Arctic
People who feel the same way will find you right away.
We will Go On Another Journey Someday
